Được làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp, khuyến khích phát triển năng lực cá nhân. Được tham gia Team Building cùng những đồng nghiệp đầy nhiệt huyết, hòa đồng, vui vẻ. Thưởng lương Tháng 13, chế độ bảo hiểm và nghỉ lễ, Tết theo luật định.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Hoạt bát, vui vẻ. Sử dụng thành thạo AI, PS. Ưu tiên biết làm clip ngắn. Sáng tạo, thiết kế đẹp mắt, phù hợp với từng thương hiệu. Chịu khó học hỏi, chủ động trong công việc. Hoạt bát vui vẻ, có trách nhiệm trong công việc. Làm việc độc lập.Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Adobe Photoshop,Thiết Kế,Thiết Kế 2DTrung cấp - NghềKhông yêu cầu

164.job_description: Salary: Negotiable Department: Engineering & Technology Company: Head Office Application deadline: 01/07 — 31/07/2024  Job description YouNet is the leading SocialTech Group creating value for enterprises by applying Social Technologies in a variety of business areas including sales, marketing, and operations. Since 2009, YouNet Group has always been a pioneer in applying social intelligence and technology in the field of sales, marketing, and operations to bring about comprehensive business performance for customers in Vietnamese and international markets. With the majority of clients being multinational companies and large-scale Vietnamese companies (most of our clients appear in the Fortune 500 and VNR500 lists), YouNet Group has uncountable industry practices related to business operations. As a result, we have extensive experience in providing strategic solutions for customers to adapt to the global 4.0 digital trend. Currently, we are looking for one IT Manager. Join us to write your own success stories! RESPONSIBILITIES: Responsible for developing network and systems’ maintenance and growth plans, managing the IT plan (OKRs, Budget forecasting), and consulting the executive team on the IT solutions that could help the company to succeed. Responsible for creating and administering disaster recovery plans that will keep the company functional in case unexpected events happen. Manage and maintain company IT policies and IT infrastructure: network, servers, virtualization, and all business software/ applications (Jira, Confluence, Social Intranet, Service Desks, Source code control (GIT, SVN), and other Back-office systems) to ensure durability and availability of these systems. Manage IT team regarding team and project management, training programs, and performance evaluation. Create, Manage, and Improve IT policies and the company’s policies, automation processes. Manage IT and Internal projects such as CRM, HRM, internal projects for digital transformation.. BENEFITS: Competitive salary,13th-month salary, performance bonus Annual Health-check to make sure you are always healthy Premium Health Care package so you don’t have to spend money when you are sick Young, Dynamic and Challenging working environment REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in IT field Have certifications in Network Security are preferable. At least 2+ years experience in IT Manager or similar position in IT-related companies. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills are required. Comprehensive understanding of network architecture and network security. Experience in managing internet traffic for a large number of users (>300) is required. Experience in designing and implementing disaster recovery plans for business continuity is required. Strong project management skills and strong ability to prioritize tasks. Prior experience in managing software projects is required. Experience in Virtualization technology and container-based technology is required. Must be experienced in managing VMWare-based systems and docker-related systems. Experience in recent technologies such as CI/CD, Kubernetes, AI, Big Data, Cloud systems is a plus.

166.job_description: Working for xspera, feels like coming home  We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer (.Net) that will be in charge of our core product, Xingate. Xingate is an Enterprise Management Portal that combines and utilizes the important components of leading-edge collaboration and communication solutions with information management and business intelligence for a “state-of-the-art» corporate management.  With our international team, we change the way companies collaborate and communicate. You could be a big part of that change. Together with our scrum team, you will work directly on a tangible end-product  Key responsibilities  Integration of user-facing elements developed by a back-end developer with server- side logic Building reusable code and libraries for future use Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability Implementation of security and data protection Design and implementation of data storage solutions Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging Write clean code to develop functional web applications Troubleshoot and debug applications Perform UI tests to optimize performance Manage cutting-edge technologies to improve legacy applications Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server- side logic Gather and address technical and design requirements Provide training and support to internal teams Build reusable code and libraries for future use Liaise with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features Follow emerging technologies  Requirements  Qualifications  Bachelor’s Degree in computer science, management information systems, or related field preferred, (or comparable work experience) English certificate of TOEIC 450 or willing to take it  Experience  3+ years’ solid experience as Software Engineer (.net) 1+ years’ experience in JavaScript/ jQuery, Ajax, JSOM, CSOM, Rest API, Angular Js, etc. performance optimization in Web Development. Fluency or understanding of specific languages, such as .net, NoteJs and operating systems may be required. Strong understanding of the web development cycle and programming techniques and tools. Focus on efficiency, user experience, and process improvement.  Knowledge and Skills  An ability to work in a fast paced & dynamic environment with short deadlines, interruptions & multiple tasks / projects occurring at once Detail-oriented, organized & capable of prioritizing workload to complete multiple tasks & meet aggressive deadlines Being able to work collaboratively & cooperatively with multiple infrastructure providers in support of technology solutions Experience in Agile software development methodologies Excellent project and time management skills. Strong problem solving and verbal and written communication skills. Ability to work independently or with a group. Eager to learn new things  Why Work at xsperaAbove market salary compensation, including 13-month pay Quarterly and yearly performance bonus compensation Annual performance reviews Personal development, training, and creative freedom Ability to participate in customer projects in EU, US & Asia Work in a global team with highly skilled and motivated people Spectacular company trips  About xspera  xspera focus on the business goals of our customers. We deliver solutions which help customers achieve their business goals faster. Our enterprise portal, xspera 5.0, adapts quickly to our client’s corporate structures reducing their process costs in many areas by as much as 30% -60% through greater transparency, digitization, and process automation. Join xspera today and be part of the digital world of tomorrow!job overview  location hcm, vietnam contract type full time experiencesalary range contact xspera job level

167.job_description: KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. We pride ourselves on creating brilliant solutions for our clients by leveraging deep expertise, advanced technologies, and delivery excellence for a shared success where everyone can reach their fullest potential. With three Business Lines:KMS Software: Leverage software domain expertise to help clients make better business decisions in technology platforms, increase speed-to-market, and gain critical development support through innovative technology solutions.  KMS Solutions: Empower BFSI businesses to embrace the digital finance revolution and expedite clients’ journey towards complete digitalization, technology consulting, data analytics, software development, and software quality.  KMS Healthcare: Build transformative next-gen technologies to solve healthcare’s most challenging problems, providing innovative tools and expertise to providers, payers, life sciences, and medical technology vendors.  ResponsibilitiesPerform hands-on coding and code review as other peer developers as needed  Understand the requirements of the customer or business and utilize this knowledge to develop applications that are consistent with this  Design, develop, review, implement, maintain and manage continuous integration, build management and deployment scripts, systems, and any code as required  Write unit tests and run through all the test cases for assigned tasks and ensure all cases are tested and passed before release for testing  Participate in Agile/Scrum activities: daily standup, demo session, retrospective, estimate and planning, etc  Perform other tasks assigned by the Line Manager  Qualifications  General Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or a related field.  Good communication in English at least at upper intermediate level.  Likely having 3+ years of experience depending on how fast of your learning and developing technical capability.  Familiar with Agile development methodologies (Scrum, XP, Kanban).  Ability to obtain deep knowledge of the project technologies and work independently with minimum guidance.  Ability to self-learn and adapt to new technologies quickly.Technical Requirements:Professional experience as a Full-Stack Software Engineer.  Proficiency in Node.js and NodeJS frameworks (Nest.js, Express.js, etc.)  Solid knowledge of OOP, design patterns and enterprise application architecture patterns.  Experience with database design and SQL (e.g., SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL).  Performs effectively & independently in software implementation activities: maintainability, re-usability, code review, unit testing, integration testing, etc.Nice to have:Experience with web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and front-end frameworks (e.g., ReactJS, Angular, VueJS, KnockoutJS)  Experience in devops CI/CD, microservices and cloud environments (Azure/AWS/GCP).  Benefits and PerksWorking in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam, Top 10 ITC Company in Vietnam  Flexible working model: Flexible time & Hybrid working from Ho Chi Minh or Da Nang city or working remotely from any location in Vietnam  Attractive Salary & Benefits, full salary in probation, social insurance on full gross salary  Performance appraisal twice a year, 13th-month salary and performance bonus  Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones  Working 5 days/week , from Monday to Friday  18+ paid leave days/year  Diverse careers opportunities with Software Services, Software Product Development  Working and growing in a values-driven, international working environment and standard Agile culture with passionate and talented teams  Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in U.S  Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills  Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc.  Fitness & sport activities: football, tennis, table tennis, badminton, yoga, swimming…  Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,…  Free in-house entertainment facilities (football, ping pong, gym…), coffee, and snacks (instant noodles, cookies, candies…)And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

180.job_description: Our company  We're Hitachi Digital Services, a global digital solutions and transformation business with a bold vision of our world's potential. We're people-centric and here to power good. Every day, we future-proof urban spaces, conserve natural resources, protect rainforests, and save lives. This is a world where innovation, technology, and deep expertise come together to take our company and customers from what's now to what's next. We make it happen through the power of acceleration.  Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to bring a better tomorrow closer to today. We don't expect you to 'fit' every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally as important to us.  The Role  Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Java code Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization Write well designed, testable, efficient code  What you'll bring  Requires a bachelor's degree (preferably in Computer Science). Technical experience and knowledge in Java/ J2EE Framework Solid understanding of object-oriented programming Skill for writing reusable Java libraries Knowledge of concurrency patterns in Java Concepts of MVC, JDBC, and RESTful Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git Familiarity with Spring boot, Spring MVC Familiarity with RDBMS: MySQL, PostgreSQL Good at communication skills  About us  We're a global, team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can bring a better tomorrow closer to today, this is the place for you. Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion  Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.  How we look after you  We help take care of your today and tomorrow with industry-leading benefits, support, and services that look after your holistic health and wellbeing. We're also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent). We're always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you'll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with.  We're proud to say we're an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

183.job_description: East Agile16 Tam Dao, District 10, Ho Chi MinhAt office Posted 11 days ago Skills: Assembly  System Engineer  Top 3 reasons to join us  Best agile environment Talented developers High salary with HR review every 6 months  Job descriptionJob Description  We are seeking a skilled and experienced Server Assembly Technician to join our team building artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The ideal candidate will be responsible for assembling high-performance AI servers from parts, handling a range of assembly tasks, and designing basic systems. The technician will work closely with our AI engineering team to ensure the servers are built to the required specifications and standards for AI workflows.  Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một Kỹ thuật viên Lắp ráp Máy chủ có kỹ năng và kinh nghiệm để gia nhập đội ngũ phát triển các giải pháp Trí tuệ Nhân tạo (AI) của chúng tôi. Ứng viên lý tưởng sẽ chịu trách nhiệm lắp ráp các máy chủ AI hiệu năng cao từ các bộ phận, xử lý một loạt các công việc lắp ráp và thiết kế các hệ thống cơ bản. Kỹ thuật viên sẽ làm việc chặt chẽ với đội ngũ kỹ sư AI của chúng tôi để đảm bảo rằng các máy chủ được xây dựng đạt đúng các thông số kỹ thuật và tiêu chuẩn cần thiết cho quy trình làm việc của AI. Key Responsibilities  1. Assemble servers from parts, following established procedures and guidelines  2. Interpret technical diagrams, schematics, and instructions to ensure accurate assembly  3. Install and configure server components, including ASUS WRX90 motherboards, AMD Ryzen Threadripper CPUs, NVMe memory, SAS RAID, redundant power supplies, heatsinks, and cooling fans  4. Perform basic system design tasks, such as selecting compatible components and optimizing server configurations for AI workloads  5. Conduct thorough testing and quality control checks to ensure the assembled servers are functioning correctly  6. Troubleshoot and resolve hardware-related issues during the assembly process  7. Maintain a clean and organized work environment, ensuring proper handling and storage of server components  8. Collaborate with the IT team to understand project requirements and provide input on server configurations  9. Stay up-to-date with the latest server hardware technologies and assembly best practices  1. Lắp ráp máy chủ từ các bộ phận, tuân theo các quy trình và hướng dẫn đã được thiết lập  2. Giải thích các biểu đồ kỹ thuật, sơ đồ mạch, và hướng dẫn để đảm bảo việc lắp ráp chính xác  3. Cài đặt và cấu hình các bộ phận máy chủ, bao gồm bo mạch chủ ASUS WRX90, CPU AMD Ryzen Threadripper, bộ nhớ NVMe, SAS RAID, nguồn điện dự phòng, tản nhiệt và quạt làm mát  4. Khả năng hiểu được tài liệu kỹ thuật bằng tiếng Anh  Preferred Qualifications  (not required)  1. Experience with basic soldering and building small components  2. Knowledge of server operating systems and software configurations  3. Familiarity with server rack mounting and cable management techniques  4. CompTIA A+ or Server+ certification  5. We encourage candidates with a strong background in server assembly or high-end gaming computer building and a passion for working with hardware to apply. 187.job_description: Microsoft 365 (M365) provides the world’s leading modern workspace cloud services, empowering communication, collaboration, and productivity. It is trusted by hundreds of millions of users worldwide and in enterprise clouds. The M365 Messaging (Transport) service, a crucial component of this system, delivers and handles billions of messages daily. The M365 Messaging (Transport) team is instrumental in upholding the high standards of performance and reliability that users have come to expect from our email and Teams messages. We are a group of dedicated professionals who are passionate about delivering low-latency messaging solutions and maintaining the robust infrastructure required for our world-class services. We are on the lookout for individuals who share our enthusiasm for messaging technology and have a drive to contribute to a team that is shaping the future of communication in the digital workspace. As a member of the M365 Messaging (Transport) team, you will be immersed in a culture that values diversity, inclusivity, and a relentless pursuit of excellence. Join us in our quest to refine and advance the messaging capabilities of M365, and take part in an exciting journey that influences how the world communicates and collaborates. Your expertise and vision could play a crucial role in driving Microsoft's ongoing success in cloud services. Responsibilities  Building distributed, highly available and resilient systems Analyzing, designing and implementing Messaging system, and ensure the highest code quality and performance Working with services spanning thousands of servers, doing tens of billions of messaging transactions and serving hundreds of millions of users Collaborate with peer engineers, partner teams, and program managers across the Worldwide to deliver cutting-edge cloud technology. Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Technology, or related fields. Minimum of 1 year of work experience; proficiency in English communication is preferred. Strong programming skills, with familiarity in at least one object-oriented programming language such as C#, C++, Python, or Java. Excellent design and data analysis skills, with a passion for product quality, performance, and engineering excellence. Exceptional learning, collaboration, and innovation skills, along with the ability to take responsibility and solve problems independently.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.
